iot_net_planner

Optimization

  • The key abstract class is OPTCoverageModel, which represents a model for maximizing coverage.

    The primary implementation is SCIPModel, which represents an implemtation using SCIP.

Uses branch and bound to solve an optimization input

class iot_net_planner.optimization.bnp_model.BNPModel
static solve_coverage(budget, min_weight, dems, facs, prr, qinc=1.0, logging=True)

Solves a CIP for coverage with branch and price

Parameters:

  • budget (float) – The maximum allowable amount to spend

  • min_weight (float) – The objective is min_weight * worst coverage + (1 - min_weight) * average coverage

  • dems (gpd.GeoDataFrame) – a GeoDataFrame of the demand points

  • facs (gpd.GeoDataFrame) – a GeoDataFrame for the potential gateways. It should have a ‘cost’ field representing how much each gateway costs (pricing is relative)

  • prr (iot_net_planner.prediction.prr_cache.CachedPRRModel) – A CachedPRRModel initialized with dems and facs

Returns:

a set of indices of facs to build

Return type:

set

An abstract class for an optimization model that solves for maximum coverage

class iot_net_planner.optimization.opt_coverage_model.OPTCoverageModel
abstract static solve_coverage(budget, min_weight, dems, facs, prr, logging=True)

Solves a CIP for coverage

Parameters:

  • budget (float) – The maximum allowable amount to spend

  • min_weight (float) – The objective is min_weight * worst coverage + (1 - min_weight) * average coverage

  • dems (gpd.GeoDataFrame) – a GeoDataFrame of the demand points

  • facs (gpd.GeoDataFrame) – a GeoDataFrame for the potential gateways. It should have a ‘cost’ field representing how much each gateway costs (pricing is relative)

  • prr (iot_net_planner.prediction.prr_cache.CachedPRRModel) – A CachedPRRModel initialized with dems and facs

Returns:

a set of indices of facs to build

Return type:

set

class iot_net_planner.optimization.scip_model.SCIPModel
static solve_coverage(budget, min_weight, dems, facs, prr, logging=True)

Solves a CIP for coverage

Parameters:

  • budget (float) – The maximum allowable amount to spend

  • min_weight (float) – The objective is min_weight * worst coverage + (1 - min_weight) * average coverage

  • dems (gpd.GeoDataFrame) – a GeoDataFrame of the demand points

  • facs (gpd.GeoDataFrame) – a GeoDataFrame for the potential gateways. It should have a ‘cost’ field representing how much each gateway costs (pricing is relative)

  • prr (iot_net_planner.prediction.prr_cache.CachedPRRModel) – A CachedPRRModel initialized with dems and facs

Returns:

a set of indices of facs to build

Return type:

set
